summary: An Ordinance relating to, and providing for, the submission to the qualified electors of The City of Seattle, for approval of rejection, that certain initiative bill or measure relating to the operation of certain kinds of "For Hire" motor vehicles commonly called "jitneys", filed with the City Comptroller on the 25th day of June, 1920, and bearing Comptroller's File No. 78031; calling a special election for such submission; and declaring an emergency.
